about_the_game:
This is the Official Artbook for Caffeine: Victoria's Legacy. It contains the following:

  • 52 Pages in total with character designs, backgrounds, CG artwork, and lore design
  • Character Design Sheets and facts
  • 10 Backgrounds with an initial sketch, outlines and lore details
  • A selection of High-Resolution CGs
  • Insignias, Coffee House Logos, and unused designs

NOTE: The Artbook Contains Spoilers.
